enb_long_title: SIXTH CONFERENCE OF THE PARTIES TO THE UN FRAMEWORK CONVENTION ON CLIMATE CHANGE RESUMED SESSION
section_title: ELECTION OF OFFICERS OTHER THAN THE PRESIDENT
sentences: The COP elected its Bureau members during COP-6 Part I, with the exception of a second Vice-President to be nominated by the Asian Group.
In Plenary on 16 July, and again on 27 July, President Pronk noted that this Group was still considering the matter.

Noting that the Bureau has important work to do before a new Bureau is elected at COP-7, including a meeting in early September in Marrakech, he urged the Asian Group to redouble its efforts to reach agreement on this matter.
